wikipedia_page.main: There was also an Arthur Mee, who produced The Children's Encyclopedia.Arthur Butler Phillips Mee (born Aberdeen, 21 October 1860, died Llanishen, 15 January 1926) was a Scottish-born newspaper journalist, editor and notable amateur astronomer.

response: The crater is named after the 19th-century Scottish astronomer Arthur Butler Phillips Mee.
